Description: I am selling pre-owned REVO Guide Extreme Men's Black Polarized Sunglasses 66 17 132 with the original case and floating safety leash. I purchased these at Sunglass Hut a few years ago when they were discontinued. Strangely, the box in the picture is for Crux glasses, which I never noticed before. Maybe they didn't have the original box, but the case certainly appears to be for these glasses and they fit nicely inside it (including the safety leash). These glasses have removeable red side clips for increased sun protection. I took the photographs with the clips in place, but when removed these look more like a "normal" pair of sunglasses. The clips are a bit tricky to place and remove because they fit so tightly, and they are extremely unlikely to fall off accidentally. There are some minor scratches on the lenses that you can see when you hold it up directly to a light source. There is some slight bubbling of the tint on the inside corner of the right lens. It was difficult to photograph. It's not visible from the outside and (at least for me) is not discernable when wearing the glasses. These glasses are ideal for fishing due to the sun blocking properties as well as the floating safety leash. Please feel free to contact me with any questions. Thank you.
